# identifier

**Instance Property**

A value defined by Apple that uniquely identifies an App Store storefront.

## Declaration

```swift
var identifier: String { get }
```

## Identifying the Storefront

- **countryCode**: The three-letter code representing the country or region associated with the App Store storefront.

items.description: The three-letter code representing the country or region associated with the App Store storefront.
items.name: countryCode
